# The `EPCEHFrameRegistrar` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Register/Deregisters EH frames in a remote process via a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executorprocesscontrol">ExecutorProcessControl</a> instance. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Register/Deregisters EH frames in a remote process via a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executorprocesscontrol">ExecutorProcessControl</a> instance.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### Create() {#a51ea537174eddbd35adc24f8e2388b26}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; EPCEHFrameRegistrar &gt; &gt; llvm::orc::EPCEHFrameRegistrar::Create (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executionsession">ExecutionSession</a> &amp; ES)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create from a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executorprocesscontrol">ExecutorProcessControl</a> instance alone.

This will use the EPC&#39;s lookupSymbols method to find the registration/deregistration function addresses by name.

If RegistrationFunctionsDylib is non-None then it will be searched to find the registration functions. If it is None then the process dylib will be loaded to find the registration functions.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/epcehframeregistrar-h/#l00036">36</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/epcehframeregistrar-h">EPCEHFrameRegistrar.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/epcehframeregistrar-cpp/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/epcehframeregistrar-cpp">EPCEHFrameRegistrar.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
